short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import or save text from any website so you can post it to your social media channels through Social Cane.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can import text from any website as content you can use at Social Cane. To import, simply select the text then right click and go to the Social Cane option where you can select to start creating content immediately or to save it for later.

Social Cane acts as a social media manager by helping you go from content ideas to published fast. It suggests ideas (/ideas), provides templates (/templates) where you can design the ideas to make images or videos and text content (/content) you can edit before you publish or schedule.  All in one place
